metadata.title: CVE-2021-41732 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** An issue was discovered in zeek version 4.1.0. There is a HTTP request splitting vulnerability that will invalidate any ZEEK HTTP based security analysis. NOTE: the vendor's position is that the observed behavior is intended.

criterions.comment: zeek package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
